languages.text:
The Pet immediately restores 100% Wounds and removes all injuries. The Pet is also resurrected if it has 0 Wounds. The next 3 Overseer abilities cost -1 AP.
Until the end of combat, all attacks of the Mastiff deal bonus damage equal to {uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}% max Wounds of the target.

traits.locale_text:
The Pet immediately restores 100% Wounds and removes all injuries. The Pet is also resurrected if it has 0 Wounds. The next 3 Overseer abilities cost -1 AP.
Until the end of combat, all attacks of the Mastiff deal bonus damage equal to {uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}% max Wounds of the target.

languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the cyber-mastiff deals additional damage equal to +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
Кибермастиф немедленно полностью восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} (даже при 0 здоровья), также с него снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывания{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}. Три следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.
До конца боя кибермастиф наносит дополнительный урон, равный {uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} цели.

До конца боя кибермастиф наносит дополнительный урон, равный {uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} цели.

Кибермастиф немедленно полностью восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} (даже при 0 здоровья), также с него снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывания{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}. Три следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.
До конца боя кибермастиф наносит дополнительный урон, равный {uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} цели.

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff regeneriert seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} vollständig (selbst wenn er 0 Wunden hat). Er wird von sämtlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-Effekten befreit. Die nächsten drei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} kosten -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes verursacht der Cyber-Mastiff zusätzlichen Schaden in Höhe von +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f} % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Ziels.</u>
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the cyber-mastiff deals additional damage equal to +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff regeneriert seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} vollständig (selbst wenn er 0 Wunden hat). Er wird von sämtlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-Effekten befreit. Die nächsten drei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} kosten -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes verursacht der Cyber-Mastiff zusätzlichen Schaden in Höhe von +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f} % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Ziels.</u>

languages.text:
Le cyber-mastiff régénère immédiatement toute sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} (même s'il n'en a aucune). Tout effet d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} dont il souffre est dissipé. Le coût des trois prochaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} est réduit de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le cyber-mastiff inflige des dégâts supplémentaires égaux à +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f} % des {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g} de la cible.
languages.original_text:

The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the cyber-mastiff deals additional damage equal to +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

Tout effet d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} dont il souffre est dissipé. Le coût des trois prochaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} est réduit de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le cyber-mastiff inflige des dégâts supplémentaires égaux à +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f} % des {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g} de la cible.

languages.text:
完全恢复生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}（即便生命值为0也可以完全恢复），同时移除{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}效果。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}接下来的3个{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。
生化獒犬的所有攻击都会额外造成<u>目标{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}%</u>点伤害，效果持续至战斗结束。

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the cyber-mastiff deals additional damage equal to +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

完全恢复生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}（即便生命值为0也可以完全恢复），同时移除{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}效果。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}接下来的3个{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。
生化獒犬的所有攻击都会额外造成<u>目标{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}%</u>点伤害，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
El cibermastín recupera inmediatamente todas las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} (aunque esté a 0 heridas). Cualquier efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} que sufra queda eliminado. Las siguientes 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, el cibermastín inflige daño adicional igual a +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f} % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del objetivo</u>.

The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

El cibermastín recupera inmediatamente todas las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} (aunque esté a 0 heridas). Las siguientes 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, el cibermastín inflige daño adicional igual a +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f} % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del objetivo</u>.

languages.text:
サイバーマスチフは即座に全快まで回復する（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0の場合も）。{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}効果は取り除かれる。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の次の3つの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}コストが-1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}される。
戦闘終了まで、サイバーマスチフは<u>そのターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の+{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}%</u>と同じ追加ダメージを与える。

The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the cyber-mastiff deals additional damage equal to +<u>{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u>.

サイバーマスチフは即座に全快まで回復する（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0の場合も）。{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}効果は取り除かれる。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の次の3つの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}コストが-1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}される。
戦闘終了まで、サイバーマスチフは<u>そのターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の+{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}%</u>と同じ追加ダメージを与える。

languages.text:
Siber mastif, anında iyileşerek tam {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlığına{/g} kavuşur (sağlık puanı 0 olsa bile). Üzerindeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g} etkileri ortadan kalkar. {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in sonraki üç {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} 1 puan daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
Siber mastif, +<u>hedefinin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}</u> kadarına denk ilave hasar verir. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

Siber mastif, +<u>hedefinin maksimum sağlık puanının %{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}</u> kadarına denk ilave hasar verir. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

Siber mastif, anında iyileşerek tam {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlığına{/g} kavuşur (sağlık puanı 0 olsa bile). {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in sonraki üç {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} 1 puan daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
Siber mastif, +<u>hedefinin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %{uip|Damage|67bed913aca646fca8bef97d7cc0648f}</u> kadarına denk ilave hasar verir. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
